com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.javassist

Class ClassPoolManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gl.vn.me.ko.sample.instrumentation.util.javassist.ClassPoolManager

  • final class ClassPoolManager
extends Object
    Provides a convenient API of creating and reusing an instance of ClassPool.

    Note that it doesn't support hierarchy of class loaders. It means that the class is not applicable for cases when classes with the same name are loaded with different class loaders.

    Instantiability: forbidden.
    Thread safety: thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      (package private) static boolean appendClassPath(ClassPath classPath)
      Appends classPath to the end of the search path of the ClassPool object.
      (package private) static ClassPool getClassPool()
      Returns an instance of ClassPool.
      (package private) static boolean prependClassPath(ClassPath classPath)
      Prepends classPath to the head of the search path of the ClassPool object.
      (package private) static void recreateClassPool(boolean preserveClassPath)
      Invocation of the method guarantees creation of a new instance of ClassPool the next time method getClassPool() will be called.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • appendClassPath

        static final boolean appendClassPath(ClassPath classPath)
        Appends classPath to the end of the search path of the ClassPool object.
        Parameters:
        classPath - The class path to append. Must be not null.
        Returns:
        • true if specified class path was appended.
        • false if specified class path wasn't appended because it was appended previously.

      • getClassPool

        static final ClassPool getClassPool()
        Returns an instance of ClassPool. Always returns the same object until recreateClassPool(boolean) method is called.
        Returns:
        An instance of ClassPool.
        See Also:
        recreateClassPool(boolean)

      • prependClassPath

        static final boolean prependClassPath(ClassPath classPath)
        Prepends classPath to the head of the search path of the ClassPool object.
        Parameters:
        classPath - The class path to prepend. Must be not null.
        Returns:
        • true if specified class path was prepended.
        • false if specified class path wasn't prepended because it was prepended previously.

      • recreateClassPool

        static final void recreateClassPool(boolean preserveClassPath)
        Invocation of the method guarantees creation of a new instance of ClassPool the next time method getClassPool() will be called.
        Parameters:
        preserveClassPath - Specifies if prepended/appended class path elements should be presented in a new instance of ClassPool.
        See Also:
        getClassPool()
